sources.title: Kakegurui (2019)
sources.description: Hyakkaou Private Academy is a prestigious institution for the privileged, which was first established 122 years ago. The students there are ranked by their gambling winnings. The winners receive everything including fame and fortune. The winners also dominates the losers. One day, female transfer student Yumeko Jabami arrives at Hyakkaou Private Academy. Yumeko Jabami has a pretty appearance, but she is a gambling maniac who loves high stakes.

metadata.Plot: Hyakaou Academy is a private and elite institute that has catered to the well-to-do for over a century. The academic ranking is based on the pupils' gambling winnings. The best are rewarded by prestige, status, wealth and lording over the bottom ranks. Yumeko is new to the academy. Her pretty enchantress looks are only surpassed by her voracious appetite to gamble it all and win it all.
metadata.Writer: Tsutomu Hanabusa, Homura Kawamoto, TÃ´ru Naomura
metadata.Actors: Minami Hamabe, Mahiro Takasugi, Aoi Morikawa
